## cilium-dbg bpf sha get

Get datapath SHA header

```
cilium-dbg bpf sha get <sha> [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help            help for get
  -o, --output string   json| yaml| jsonpath='{}'
```

      --config string        Config file (default is $HOME/.cilium.yaml)
